From the sound of " child " and "辥", the original meaning is concubine, that is, the son born of concubine. "Shuowen": "Successful son. From the son, the next sound." "Yanzi Chunqiu-Admonishment Eleventh": "There is no difference between the young and the old, and the sins are the same. It is the foundation of the thieves and the traitors."

" Evil " can mean harm and suffering. "Chu Ci‧ Tianwen": "The emperor descends on Yiyi and destroys the Xiamin." Wang Fuzhi explained: "Release, change also. Revolutionize the evil, Xia Zuo and Xiamin."

" Negligence " can also mean disobedience and unfilial piety. Han Jiayi's "New Book-Daoshu": "Zi Aili refers to filial piety, but anti-filial piety is a sin."

" Evil " also means disaster. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧October": "The evil of the people, the bandits descend from the sky." Zheng Xuanjian: "Evil, evil, it is a disaster."

" Nie " also refers to a chaotic or evil person. "Wen Xuan-He Yan "Jing Fu Temple Fu"": "Because of the Dongshi's contribution, the bribe of the sea evil." Li Shan's note: "Wu's secluded residence in the sea song called chaos, so it is called the sea evil."

" Evil " also means sin and sin in modern Chinese. Jin Dong Jieyuan's "The Tune of the Western Chamber" Volume 3: "It is hard to let go of each other's passions, because they are all due to their own sins."

humanum_full_description:
從「子」，「辥」聲，本義為庶子，即妾媵所生之子。《說文》：「庶子也。从子，辥聲。」《晏子春秋‧諫上十一》：「長少無等，宗孽無別，是設賊樹姦之本也。」

　　「孽」可表示為害、使受憂患。《楚辭‧天問》：「帝降夷羿，革孽夏民。」王夫之通釋：「革，變也。革孽，革夏祚而孽夏民。」

　　「孽」亦可表示忤逆，不孝順。漢賈誼《新書‧道術》：「子愛利親謂之孝，反孝為孽。」

　　「孽」也表示災禍。《詩‧小雅‧十月》：「下民之孽，匪降自天。」鄭玄箋：「孽，妖孽，謂相為災害也。」

　　「孽」還指作亂或邪惡的人。《文選‧何晏〈景福殿賦〉》：「因東師之獻捷，就海孽之賄賂。」李善注：「以吳僻居海曲而稱亂，故曰海孽。」

　　「孽」在近現代漢語中還表示罪孽、罪過。金董解元《西廂記諸宮調》卷三：「多情彼此難割捨，都緣只是自家孽。」

孽字的基本解释

孽
niè
恶因，恶事，邪恶：孽臣（奸佞之臣）。孽种（zh弉g ）。孽根。孽海。孽障（ａ．长辈骂后辈为不肖子弟的话；ｂ．佛教指妨碍修行的种种罪恶。均亦称“业障”）。作孽（做伤天害理的事）。罪孽（罪恶）。造孽。
奴隶社会、封建社会多妻制下指妾及其子女：孽妾。孽子。
